mods.abstract: Loose Photographs 21 of the album includes two photographs.; Photograph 1 [257] shows three men, a woman and a boy in field harvesting rice.; Photograph 2 shows a field with crops with irrigation ditches and several rice bundle stacks out to dry.
mods.note: Compare photographs to the following publication. Stubbs, W.C. (1900) Rice. Louisiana Bulletin, No. 61, pp. 371-436.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
